Posted By: TwoStars (9/23/2011 1:39:01 PM)

posts.post_content:
I love how when people see this card they immediately think "Reanimation Deck". I love this just for getting back guys after they've been hated on from the battlefield, *"Oh you killed my [Geist-Honored Monk](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Geist-Honored Monk)? Well guess what, she's back with even more friends!"*   
  
Really awesome card all around, reanimation deck / getting key players back etc. I think it can nicely fit into any Black / White deck that is packing some nice creatures.

Posted By: MyrBattlecube (10/4/2011 9:07:59 PM)

posts.post_content: I don't see what all the fuss is about. It's 5 mana, which isn't significantly cheaper than anything else you could just hard cast (in Standard). Its cheaper flashback cost isn't in a color that's good at milling (Black or Blue). And it's restricted to *your* graveyard. I'd rather have [Rise from the Grave](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Rise from the Grave), just for less restrictions (and ideally something more like [Animate Dead](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Animate Dead) or [Reanimate](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Reanimate), for getting those threats out quickly).
posts.html:
I don't see what all the fuss is about. It's 5 mana, which isn't significantly cheaper than anything else you could just hard cast (in Standard). Its cheaper flashback cost isn't in a color that's good at milling (Black or Blue). And it's restricted to your graveyard. I'd rather have Rise from the Grave, just for less restrictions (and ideally something more like Animate Dead or Reanimate, for getting those threats out quickly).
